Uses of Class
jam.fit.Matrix

Packages that use Matrix
jam.fit Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms. 
 

Uses of Matrix in jam.fit
 

Methods in jam.fit that return Matrix
 Matrix Matrix.transpose()
           
 Matrix Matrix.sub(int r1, int r2, int c1, int c2)
          returns the submatrix specified by the row and column range arguments requires r2>=r1, c2>=c1
 Matrix Matrix.permute(int a1, int a2, char c)
          Returns a permuted matrix according code c where c is in {'c', 'r'} for columns or rows and a1, a2 represent the columns/rows to swap
 Matrix Matrix.Q()
           
 Matrix Matrix.R()
           
 Matrix Matrix.lr(int iter)
           
 Matrix Matrix.qreig(int iter)
           
 Matrix Matrix.sort()
           
 Matrix Matrix.order()
           
 

Constructors in jam.fit with parameters of type Matrix
Matrix(Matrix m1, Matrix m2, char code)
          perform an operation on A & B
operation = '+' -> return a new matrix equal to A + B
operation = '-' -> return a new matrix equal to A - B
operation = '*' -> return a new matrix equal to A * B (arbitrary matrix-vector product)
operation = '\' -> backsolve similar to MATLAB x = A\b
Matrix(double x, Matrix m, char code)
          perform an operation on y & A
operation = '*' -> scalar-matrix product y*A
Matrix(Matrix m)
          return a copy of matrix M
